Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PDC213 (beta-casein 213-224, CAMP211-225,natural AMPs; human, primates, mammals, animals; BBMm;  UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 44.4% similarity tocow Casecidin 17. GRAVY: 0.44; M. Wt: 1453.723; mol formula: C67H111N17O19; molar ext coeff. 0. Active against S. aureus and Y. enterocolitica (80% inhibition at 15 ug/ml).  It is a endogenous peptide with higher levels in preterm milk. Another form corresponding to residues 211-225 has also been found (Wang et al., 2020).Activity: This form is active against E. coli (MIC 3.125 ug/ml) and Y. enterocolitica (MIC 6.25 ug/ml). Updated 2/2020.
Literature Information.Author: Sun Y, Zhou Y, Liu X, Zhang F, Yan L, Chen L, Wang X, Ruan H, Ji C, Cui X, Wang J.2017
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial activity and mechanism of PDC213, an endogenous peptide from human milk.
